text: Euphorbia aprica is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. This common forest plant is probably a species complex, but the taxonomy is not certain.Haevermans, T. 2004. Euphorbia aprica. 2010 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 11 June 2011. ==References== Category:Flora of Madagascar aprica Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia aprica
